title: Custom Airflow trike pin striped by Nefarious

posts.content:
This custom airflow Sky King trike has sat in pride of place in my office / spare bedroom since the day I bought it.
I bought it off a really nice guy called Chris who did the custom paint work, denim seat etc and he got it pin striped by Nefarious a very well respected name in the world of VW's & Rods.
It cost me £325 plus delivery so I am going to ask £325 for it and see what happens.

I'll post a couple of pics up but if you look on Rodsnsods and search Custom Sky King trike in the parts for sale section the original ad will come up and his pics are far better than mine.







It really does need to be seen to fully appreciate the colours and you can do that in Penrhyn Bay near Llandudno, what better excuse for a day out
